definitions.definition: To lower the temperature of something; to cool

definitions.example: In the wind he chilled quickly.

definitions.definition: To harden a metal surface by sudden cooling
To become hard by rapid cooling

definitions.example: Chill, man, we've got a whole week to do it; no sense in getting worked up.

definitions.definition: To "hang", hang out; to spend time with another person or group. Also chill out.
definitions.example: Hey, we should chill this weekend.
On Friday night do you wanna chill?

definitions.definition: The act by which something is chilled.

definitions.example: It was a chilling story, but the children enjoyed it.
